EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Roadshow_Benchmark Breakfast_Australia_Q318.Invite 3 - Melbourne
EmailTemplate.subject: Breakfast Invite: Built To Adapt Benchmark Australia Results
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
I would like to invite you to be my guest at the upcoming executive breakfast: Innovating at Startup Speed in a Software-Driven World: https://connect.pivotal.io/au_benchmark_breakfasts_1018.html
Melbourne - 25th Oct - 8am - White Lane - REGISTER: https://connect.pivotal.io/au_benchmark_breakfasts_1018.html
VIEW THE AGENDA: https://connect.pivotal.io/au_benchmark_breakfasts_1018.html
Join Pivotal for an executive breakfast with your industry peers as we discuss lessons learned at the cutting edge of software development in Australia and how to implement long-term transformation within your organisation. This event will also feature insights from the Build To Adapt Benchmark, an industry survey, created in partnership with Longitude Research and Ovum, that investigates the indicators for understanding how well organisations build software that delivers business value.
Featured Speakers:Â James Bligh, Co-Founder, RedCrew (former Senior Manager Commercial Feasibility at National Australia Bank) and Roz Gregory, Director Customer Success & Digital Transformation, APJ, Pivotal
We look forward to seeing you there.
Regards, Lionel Lim Vice President and Managing Director, Asia Pacific & Japan Pivotal
